author: 108joannan
title: Great Business Hotel - Review
text: Always welcoming, rooms are comfortable, modern and clean. Sometimes don't get to hotel in time to go out to eat, and food is brilliant - including room service. Bar and restaurant are great even if you're on your own. Great position too - close to bars and restaurants and key rail stations.
